title: Bug 17832Vertical Scrollbar clipped
description: Eclipse F1Synchronize a file that has outoging changes.Select the file so that the Java Source Compare is visibile.There is a scrollbar on the far right hand side of the Java Source Compare andit is clipped.I am not sure if SWT is giving the wrong answer for the width of teh scrollbaror if Java Source Compare is just guessing the width.
